# `ListPicker` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| id | `string` | No | Optional unique identifier to help map component replies to form messages where multiple List Pickers can be present. |
| title | `string` | No | Text to show in the title. |
| subtitle | `string` | No | Text to show in the description. |
| sections | [`ListPickerSection[]`](listpickersection-definition.md) | Yes | An array of sections in the List Picker. |
